tweets.text: Devastating destruction of a Chalkstream & all preventableü§¨The EA with proper enforcement could have stopped this last Autumn @jamesowild @NFUtweets @_BrambleCottage @GlavenEel @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgencyAnglia @DefraGovUK @N_Rivers_Trust @joe_crowley @The_WMA @WildTroutTrust https://t.co/mPcZMXIQvG https://t.co/c9PlsmXC0L

@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency My impression is that the problem goes back to the idea of softly, softly 'better regulation'. In  principle, it's fair enough: to err is human, after all; not knowing what you are supposed to do is not that unusual. But in execution, we get this kind of utter debacle.

@RussellB1ggs @jamesowild @NFUtweets @_BrambleCottage @GlavenEel @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgencyAnglia @DefraGovUK @N_Rivers_Trust @joe_crowley @The_WMA @WildTroutTrust Getting the @EnvAgency to even acknowledge a problem seems ridiculously hard, let alone getting them to sort it out.üò¨

What is he drinking ?ü§£ü§£ü§£
